title: Smartwatch global unit sales forecast 2014 to 2015
summary: This statistic shows the market share of the disk and optical drive market worldwide in 2014 and the first quarter of 2018 , by manufacturer . In the first quarter of 2018 , with its market share of 32.3 percent , western digital was the leader of the disk and optical drive market .
gold: The statistic shows the unit sales of smartwatches worldwide from 2014 to 2015 , by region . For 2015 , smartwatch sales are projected to total 7.4 million units in North America .
